readme.content:
## README - This is a default page
URLinkCat (URL Link Catalog) is a **free, open-source, fully customizable, multi-user, cloud-synced** bookmark web app. 

 I am a default README.md for any URLinkCat pages, so feel free to modify my content. For detailed instructions on how to create your own bookmark collection page, please visit https://github.com/cxumol/URLinkCat. 

If you find it interesting as a developer, please consider giving this project a star on GitHub.

sites.url: javascript:alert('click bottom-right cloud button to save your changes at this #pageid')
sites.name: Don't Forget to Save to Cloud
